description: Probably related to tafia (“type of rum”).

entries.meaning: (US) A soft, chewy candy made from boiled sugar, molasses, or corn syrup and butter.

examples: […]  if these statistices should seem to fail to tally with the facts, in places, do not nudge your neighbor, or press your foot upon his toes, or manifest, by any other sign, your awareness that taffy is being distributed.
